00014 #ifndef MAPBITS_H
00015 #define MAPBITS_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 
00019 //
00020 // Maximum numbers of (graphical)-zoomlevels allowd in the
00021 // map. log(Number_GFX_ZOOMLEVELS) bits are used in the 32b
00022 // localID that identifies the items on the map.
00023 // -------------------------------------------------------------
00024 #define NUMBER_GFX_ZOOMLEVELS 16
00025 // -------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 
00028 
00029 //
00030 // ID of the first overviewmap. The overview maps will be
00031 // handled in a proper way later (every map must know its
00032 // parent and childs)
00033 // -------------------------------------------------------------
00034 #define FIRST_OVERVIEWMAP_ID  0x80000000
00035 // ------------------------------------------------------------
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039 //
00040 // ID of the first country map. The country maps will be
00041 // handled in a proper way later (every map must know its
00042 // parent and childs)
00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------
00044 #define FIRST_COUNTRYMAP_ID  0x80000001
00045 // ------------------------------------------------------------
00046 
00047 
00048 //
00049 // ID of the first super overivew map. The country maps will be
00050 // handled in a proper way later (every map must know its
00051 // parent and childs)
00052 // -------------------------------------------------------------
00053 #define FIRST_SUPEROVERVIEWMAP_ID 0x90000000
00054 // ------------------------------------------------------------
00055 
00056 
00057 //
00058 // Name of map index file.
00059 // Used for storing the information about the maps
00060 // needed by the MapModule leader.
00061 // -------------------------------------------------------------
00062 #define INDEX_NAME "index.db"
00063 // ------------------------------------------------------------
00064 
00068 typedef uint32 MapID;
00069 
00073 namespace MapBits {
00074 
00081 inline bool isOverviewMap( MapID mapID ) {
00082    return ((mapID >= FIRST_OVERVIEWMAP_ID) && ((mapID & 1) == 0));
00083 }
00084 
00090 inline bool isCountryMap( MapID mapID ) {
00091    return ((mapID >= FIRST_OVERVIEWMAP_ID) && ((mapID & 1) == 1));
00092 }
00093 
00099 inline bool isUnderviewMap( MapID mapID ) {
00100    return (mapID < FIRST_OVERVIEWMAP_ID);
00101 }
00102 
00110 inline MapID overviewToCountry( MapID mapID )  {
00111    if ( isUnderviewMap( mapID ) ) {
00112       return (MAX_UINT32);
00113    } else {
00114       return ((mapID & 0xfffffffe) + 1);
00115    }
00116 }
00117 
00125 inline MapID countryToOverview( MapID mapID )  {
00126    if ( isUnderviewMap( mapID ) ) {
00127       return (MAX_UINT32);
00128    } else {
00129       return (mapID & 0xfffffffe);
00130    }
00131 }
00132 
00138 inline uint32 getMapLevel( MapID mapID ) {
00139    if ( isUnderviewMap( mapID ) ) {
00140       return 0;
00141    } else {
00142       return (mapID >> 28) - 7;
00143    }
00144 }
00145 
00151 inline MapID nextMapID( MapID mapID ) {
00152    if ( isUnderviewMap( mapID ) ) {
00153       return (mapID + 1);
00154    } else {
00155       return (mapID + 2);
00156    }
00157 }
00158 
00160 inline MapID getMapIDWithMapSet(MapID mapID, uint32 mapSet) {
00161    return mapID | ((mapSet & 0x07) << 24);
00162 }
00163 
00165 inline uint32 getMapSetFromMapID( MapID mapID ) {
00166    return ( (mapID >> 24) & 0x07);
00167 }
00168 
00170 inline MapID getMapIDWithoutMapSet( MapID mapID ) {
00171    return mapID & 0xF8FFFFFF;
00172 }
00173 
00174 } // MapBits
00175 
00176 #endif // MAPBITS_H
